titles.title: Overseas Americans Financial Access Act
Overseas Americans Financial Access Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exception from certain reporting requirements with respect to the foreign accounts of individuals who live abroad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Overseas Americans Financial Access Act
This bill modifies tax reporting requirements that apply to foreign financial institutions and individuals with foreign financial assets to create exceptions for the foreign accounts of certain U.S. residents or citizens living abroad.
